summary.para: The ITfTransitoryExtensionUIElement.GetDocumentMgr method returns the pointer of the transitory document manager.

param.name: ppdim
param.para: [out] A pointer to receive the interface pointer. This document manager object contains a context object that has the interface and contains the text of the transitory extension.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: One or more parameters are invalid.

summary.para: The ITfTransitoryExtensionUIElement interface is implemented by TSF manager which provides the UI of transitory extension. The application that is in UILess mode will use this interface to determine if the original UI should be shown or the content of this UI should be drown by the application.
